sen.j: 若柳 吉蔵（わかやぎ きちぞう）は、若柳流宗家家元の名跡。
sen.e: The term "Kichizo WAKAYAGI" refers to a professional name of iemoto (the head) of Soke (the head family or house) of the Wakayagi school.
sen.cmt: 家元: ここでは「the head of a school」(研究社Online Dictionary)と解釈されるため、その意味で訳しましたが、「of a school」は、後の「the Wakayagi school」と重複するため省略しました。
sen.e: The term "Kichizo WAKAYAGI" refers to a professional name of iemoto (the head) of Soke (the head family or house) of the Wakayagi school.
The term "Kichizo WAKAYAGI" refers to a professional name of iemoto (the head) of Soke (the head family or house) of the Wakayagi school.

sen.j: 当代3代目。
sen.e: Kichizo WAKAYAGI the third has succeeded to the name at present.
Kichizo WAKAYAGI the third has succeeded to the name at present.
Kichizo WAKAYAGI the third has succeeded to the name at present.

sen.j: 5世若柳流宗家家元。
sen.e: He is the fifth iemoto of the Wakayagi school.
He is the fifth iemoto of the Wakayagi school.
He is the fifth iemoto of the Wakayagi school.

sen.j: 歴代の家元に関しては若柳流派と家元項参照。
sen.e: For details on the successive iemoto, refer to the section on the Wakayagi school and its iemoto.
For details on the successive iemoto, refer to the section on the Wakayagi school and its iemoto.
For details on the successive iemoto, refer to the section on the Wakayagi school and its iemoto.
Kichizo WAKAYAGI the first was born on June 21, 1879, and died on January 25, 1944.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: Kichizo WAKAYAGI (June 21, 1879 - January 25, 1944)
sen.cmt: 生没年の表記を訂正しました。
sen.e: Kichizo WAKAYAGI (June 21, 1879 - January 25, 1944)

sen.j: 本名は竹内幸太郎。
sen.e: His real name is Kotaro TAKEUCHI.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: His real name is Kotaro TAKEUCHI.
His real name is Kotaro TAKEUCHI.

sen.j: 2世若柳流家元。
sen.e: He was the second iemoto of the Wakayagi school.
He was the second iemoto of the Wakayagi school.
He was the second iemoto of the Wakayagi school.

sen.j: 東京小石川水道町の生まれ。
sen.e: He was born in Suido-cho, Koishikawa, Tokyo.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処/水道町: 読み方は「すいどうちょう」と推測しています。
sen.e: He was born in Suido-cho, Koishikawa, Tokyo.
He was born in Suido-cho, Koishikawa, Tokyo.

sen.j: 父が落語家で「すててこ踊り」で一世風靡した三遊亭圓遊初代。
sen.e: His father is a rakugo story teller, Enyu SANYUTEI the first, who was very popular because of his suteteko (men's underwear) dance (comical dance performed by a man wearing a suteteko) for a period of time.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処/ステテコ踊り: 「The Steteco Dance (The Dance, wearing with Steteco of men's undershorts)」と登録されていますが、ローマ字の綴り等を修正しました。
sen.e: His father is a rakugo story teller, Enyu SANYUTEI the first, who was very popular because of his suteteko (men's underwear) dance (comical dance performed by a man wearing a suteteko) for a period of time.

His father is a rakugo story teller, Enyu SANYUTEI the first, who was very popular because of his suteteko (men's underwear) dance (comical dance performed by a man wearing a suteteko) for a period of time.

sen.j: 12歳で振付師・西川古代に入門。
sen.e: He had become the disciple of a choreographer named Kodai NISHIKAWA at the age of 12.
sen.cmt: 西川古代: 読み方は「にしかわ こだい」と推測しています。
sen.e: He had become the disciple of a choreographer named Kodai NISHIKAWA at the age of 12.
He had become the disciple of a choreographer named Kodai NISHIKAWA at the age of 12.

sen.j: 2年後廃業した。
sen.e: But he gave up dance after two years.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: But he gave up dance after two years.
But he gave up dance after two years.

sen.j: 落語家に転じ父の門下になった。
sen.e: He changed to a rakugo story teller to become a disciple of his father.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: He changed to a rakugo story teller to become a disciple of his father.
He changed to a rakugo story teller to become a disciple of his father.

sen.j: 三遊亭清遊から三遊亭小圓遊を名乗った。
sen.e: After he had used the name Seiyu SANYUTEI, he changed his name to Koenyu SANYUTEI.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: After he had used the name Seiyu SANYUTEI, he changed his name to Koenyu SANYUTEI.
After he had used the name Seiyu SANYUTEI, he changed his name to Koenyu SANYUTEI.

sen.j: その後新派の俳優を経て、1896年に再度舞踊に転じた。
sen.e: Then he changed to an actor of a new school, but he returned to dancing in 1896.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: Then he changed to an actor of a new school, but he returned to dancing in 1896.
Then he changed to an actor of a new school, but he returned to dancing in 1896.

sen.j: 若柳流・若柳吉松（後の若柳壽童）の門下になった。
sen.e: He became the disciple of Yoshimatsu WAKAYAGI (later Judo WAKAYAGI) of the Wakayagi school.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: He became the disciple of Yoshimatsu WAKAYAGI (later Judo WAKAYAGI) of the Wakayagi school.
He became the disciple of Yoshimatsu WAKAYAGI (later Judo WAKAYAGI) of the Wakayagi school.

sen.j: 翌年吉蔵を名乗る。
sen.e: The following year, he began to use the name Kichizo.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: The following year, he began to use the name Kichizo.
The following year, he began to use the name Kichizo.

sen.j: 1917年に師・壽童の没し翌年、2世若柳流家元を継ぐ。
sen.e: After his master Judo had died in 1917, he became the second iemoto of the Wakayagi school the next year.
After his master Judo had died in 1917, he became the second iemoto of the Wakayagi school the next year.
After his master Judo had died in 1917, he became the second iemoto of the Wakayagi school the next year.

sen.j: 養子が2代目吉蔵（後の2代目壽童）を襲名し3世若柳流家元を継いだ。
sen.e: His adopted son had succeeded to the name Kichizo (the second), who later succeeded to the name Judo (the second) and became the third iemoto of the Wakayagi school.
His adopted son had succeeded to the name Kichizo (the second), who later succeeded to the name Judo (the second) and became the third iemoto of the Wakayagi school.
His adopted son had succeeded to the name Kichizo (the second), who later succeeded to the name Judo (the second) and became the third iemoto of the Wakayagi school.

sen.j: 若柳 吉蔵（大正10年（1921年）8月11日 - 平成元年（1989年）7月17日）。
sen.e: Kichizo WAKAYAGI the second was born on August 11, 1921, and died on July 17, 1989.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: Kichizo WAKAYAGI (August 11, 1921 - July 17, 1989)
sen.cmt: 生没年の表記を訂正しました。
sen.e: Kichizo WAKAYAGI (August 11, 1921 - July 17, 1989)

sen.j: 本名は竹内正次。
sen.e: His real name is Shoji TAKEUCHI.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処/名前の読み方は「たけうち しょうじ」と推測しています。
sen.e: His real name is Shoji TAKEUCHI.
His real name is Shoji TAKEUCHI.

sen.j: 3世若柳流家元。
sen.e: He was the third iemoto of the Wakayagi school.
He was the third iemoto of the Wakayagi school.
He was the third iemoto of the Wakayagi school.

sen.j: 後の2代目寿童。
sen.e: Later he succeeded to the name Judo (the second).
Later he succeeded to the name Judo (the second).
Later he succeeded to the name Judo (the second).

sen.j: 姉には初世若柳吉世。
sen.e: His older sister is Kichisei WAKAYAGI the first.
His older sister is Kichisei WAKAYAGI the first.
His older sister is Kichisei WAKAYAGI the first.

sen.j: 若柳 吉蔵（昭和45年（1970年）1月10日 -） 本名は竹内英雄。
sen.e: Kichizo WAKAYAGI the third was born on January 10, 1970, and his real name is Hideo TAKEUCHI.
sen.cmt: 竹内英雄: 読み方は「たけうち ひでお」と推測しています。
sen.e: Kichizo WAKAYAGI (January 10, 1970 -) and his real name is Hideo TAKEUCHI.
sen.cmt: 生没年の表記を訂正しました。
sen.e: Kichizo WAKAYAGI (January 10, 1970 -) and his real name is Hideo TAKEUCHI.

sen.j: 5世若柳流家元。
sen.e: He is the fifth iemoto of the Wakayagi school.
He is the fifth iemoto of the Wakayagi school.
He is the fifth iemoto of the Wakayagi school.

sen.j: 2代目の三男。
sen.e: He is the third son of the second iemoto of the school.
He is the third son of the second iemoto of the school.
He is the third son of the second iemoto of the school.

sen.j: 若柳吉蔵 (3代目)の項参照。
sen.e: Refer to the section on Kichizo WAKAYAGI (the third) for details.
